meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>hair</kanji> <kanji>model</kanji> is how you model your hair. It's your <vocabulary>hairstyle</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>hairdo</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings are the vocab readings of the individual kanji. For 髪 that's no problem. For 型 just remember that it's the individual vocab reading. Watch out for the rendaku.
